sentences.en: A rowdy kid like that is just the kind that parents dote on.
sentences.cn: 做父母所宠爱的,正是这种调皮捣蛋的孩子.

sentences.en: And great souls , at one stroke, may do and dote.
sentences.cn: 和谐的韵律;而凭一张弓,真诚的/灵魂, 可以在勒索、也同时在溺爱.

sentences.en: Grandparents just love to dote on their grandchildren.
sentences.cn: 爷爷奶奶总爱溺爱他们的孙儿女.

sentences.en: He dotes on his nine-year-old son.
sentences.cn: 他对自己9岁的儿子十分溺爱。

sentences.en: I dote upon it - from the beach.
sentences.cn: 我非常喜欢它 —— 从沙滩上看去.

sentences.en: I just dote on hot buttered scones!
sentences.cn: 我就是喜欢吃涂黄油的热司康饼!

sentences.en: I've said i'II dote on my dotey!
sentences.cn: 我说过我会溺爱我的宝贝的.

sentences.en: Life is a lovely kitten, dote on it.
sentences.cn: 生活是一只可爱的小猫, 让你喜欢它.

sentences.en: Love the sea? I dote upon it — from the beach.
sentences.cn: 你喜欢海 吗 ?我非常喜欢它——从沙滩上看去.

sentences.en: Nature shall not grow old and dote.
Parents often dote on their youngest child.
sentences.cn: 父母通常宠爱最小的孩子.

sentences.en: Parents who dote on their only child.
sentences.cn: 过分溺爱独生子女的父母.

sentences.en: Responsibility to dote on your work, do the goalkeeper.
sentences.cn: 责任意识的要求是:钟爱你的工作, 做好守门员.

sentences.en: She began to dote right after her 91 st birthday.
sentences.cn: 在她91岁生日后她开始衰老.

sentences.en: Teachers dote on kids of the rich and mighty.
sentences.cn: 老师会偏心那些父母有地位有钱的孩子.

sentences.en: You shouldn't dote on children, for it isn't good for their growth.
sentences.cn: 宠惯孩子并不利于他们的成长.

trans.tran_en: If you say that someone dotes on a person or a thing, you mean that they love or care about them very much and ignore any faults they may have
If you say that someone dotes on a person or a thing, you mean that they love or care about them very much and ignore any faults they may have
